_header: That ilk man will learn well

BodDig102.First Lines:
That ilke man wole lerne welTo loue god wiþ al his
                    myȝt…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…In that blisse god graunte vs goþe trewe loue woneþ
                    wiþ oute ende
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 73-9.
